DOC.brief_title: A Food Effect Phase I Study Sufatinib Healthy Subjects ( HMPL-012 )
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate determine effect food PK ( pharmacokinetics ) single dose 250 mg Sufatinib metabolites healthy subject assess safety tolerability single dose 250mg healthy subjects.This study open-label , randomize , two-period , crossover PK food effect study Sufatinib administer orally 250 mg . Subjects screen eligibility 14 day prior entry study , 2 treatments,2 week follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Males , 18 55 year age , inclusive . Body mass index ( BMI ) within range 20 30 kg/m2 , inclusive . In good health , determine clinically significant finding medical history , physical examination , 12lead ECG , vital sign . Adequate hepatic , renal , heart , hematologic function Male subject either sterile agree use get agreement sexual partner use , period inform consent 90 day follow Study Completion , 1 follow approve method contraception : condom , use female sexual partner intrauterine device , contraceptive sponge , diaphragm , use cervical cap ; oral , implantable , transdermal , injectable contraceptive contraceptive measure . Able comprehend willing sign inform consent form ( ICF ) . disease history clinical manifestation significant metabolic/endocrine , allergic , dermatological , hepatic , renal , hematological , pulmonary , immune , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , genitourinary , neurological , psychiatric disorder ( determined Investigator ) . History significant hypersensitivity , intolerance , allergy drug compound , food , substance , unless approve Investigator . serum total bilirubin > 34.2 umol/L； serum albumin < 35 g/L； GFR < 80 mL/min/1.73m2 . Algorithm : GFR ( mL/min/1.73m2 ) =186 × ( SCr ) 1.154 × ( Age ) 0.203 , Scr= serum creatinine , mg/dL； Blood pressure great 140/90 . History presence abnormal ECG , , Investigator 's opinion , clinically significant . Smoking 10 cigarette daily without intention quit smoking study . History stomach intestinal surgery , nephrectomy , cholecystectomy resection would potentially alter absorption and/or excretion orally administer drug determine investigator ( appendectomy and/or hernia repair may allow ) . Significant allergy history ( eg . drug allergy ) ; acute allergic rhinitis food allergy within 2 week prior inform consent . Donation blood plasma ≥ 500 mL 30 day prior informed consent , blood plasma ≥250 mL 2 week prior inform consent . Receipt blood product within 2 month prior inform consent ; Poor peripheral venous access . Participants positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBs antigen ) hepatitis B core antibody , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody ; Participants human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) positive ; Diagnosis alcoholism drug addiction within 1 year prior inform consent . Participation investigational drug study receipt investigational study drug occur within 5 halflives 28 day , whichever long prior inform consent . Use prescription medication product within 14 day prior informed consent . Use overthecounter ( OTC ) , nonprescription preparation ( include vitamin , mineral , phytotherapeutic , herbal , ) within 7 day prior informed consent . Use alcohol , grapefruit , Seville orange , caffeinecontaining food , juice , beverage within 72 hour prior inform consent . Use known hepatic renal clearance alter agent ( eg , erythromycin , cimetidine , barbiturate , phenothiazine , herbal/plant derive preparation St. John 's Wort , etc . ) period 60 day prior first dose ; principal investigator , investigator , pharmacist , Clinical Research Coordinator personnel relate study . Any acute chronic condition , opinion Investigator , would limit subject 's ability complete and/or participate clinical study .
